PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-07612021-08-04HC,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Centre on Substance Abuse Act
PrecisRe-appointment of ANNE ELIZABETH LAPOINTE of Montréal, Quebec, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Centre on Substance Abuse, to hold office during pleasure for a term of eighteen months, effective September 7, 2021.
AttachmentsAttachment
act: Canadian Centre on Substance Abuse Act
precis: Re-appointment of ANNE ELIZABETH LAPOINTE of Montréal, Quebec, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Centre on Substance Abuse, to hold office during pleasure for a term of eighteen months, effective September 7, 2021.
